title: Buying Elementalist for a friend?
body: There are two packs for Elementalist, Masters including more things such as the ward. If I bought the skin for a friend through the gifting center, could he buy the rest of the masters pack at a discount?

replies.body: The bundle should be flexible, so your friend could purchase the rest for the remaining price.  No worries!
Yes, he should be able to buy the Master Bundle for 700 RP. 3950 RP (Bundle Price) - 3250 RP (Base Skin Price) = 700
